subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Wayne Rooney is the talk of Europe. By day, he is portrayed in a Manchester courtroom as a poor unfortunate, exploited by agents. By night, he is a soccer alpha male in his prime.
snippet: Wayne Rooney is the talk of Europe. By day, he is portrayed in a Manchester courtroom as a poor unfortunate, exploited by agents. By night, he is a soccer alpha male in his prime.
